fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A report said the Netherlands was considering returning a Banjarmasin diamond to Sri Lanka. That should have said to Indonesia (Rijksmuseum says failure to return artefacts is ‘disgrace’, 14 March, page 33). • White Hart Lane is on the overground transport network and not underground as we implied in a headline (U-turn hands Spurs dramatic victory in bid to change tube station name, 18 March, page 3). • Other recently corrected articles include: Labour divisions over people’s vote exposed by Commons rebellion ‘We are fighting’: Brazil’s indigenous groups unite to protect their land Is Algeria on the cusp of freedom, or does Bouteflika have one last play? Geoffrey Cox has no grounds to change his mind on the Northern Ireland backstop
